Last Update: Tue Jul 01 12:28:02 +0200 2008

Helps with google maps, see googles online reference.

The best way to get to know the google maps plugin is to pull our mapping samples 

  git clone git://quiver.cuspcode.net/repos/mapping_samples

In your layout

  include_google_javascript :key => YOUR_GOOGLE_MAPS_KEY

In your view or layout

  google_map :width => 600, :height => 600

In your Helper or View

  run_map_script do
    map = Google::Map.new(:controls => [:small_map, :map_type],
                          :center => {:latitude => -33.947, :longitude => 18.462},
                          :zoom => 12)
  end

[Validate]
